entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort Qu'Appelle
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:39 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -26.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Indian Head AAFC 11:00 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023
Temperature: -26.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -40
Dewpoint: -29.5°C
Wind: W 26 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 29. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023
